name: load-funnel-test
description: Load testing for sales funnels with Playwright

scripts.test: npm run clean && npx playwright test && npm run dashboard
scripts.test:load: npm run clean && npx playwright test --workers=10 --repeat-each=5 && npm run dashboard
scripts.test:heavy: npm run clean && npx playwright test --workers=20 --repeat-each=10 && npm run dashboard
